General.Name: Iljin HySolus Co Ltd
General.Description: ILJIN Hysolus Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells composite tanks in South Korea. It offers hydrogen tanks for use in forklifts, ships, trains, passenger cars, and commercial vehicles; tube trailers for use in hydrogen transport and mobile refueling stations; CNG storage tanks for CNG passenger and commercial vehicles; and ultrafine and fine particles NOx reduction systems for diesel cars. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Bongdong-eup, South Korea. ILJIN Hysolus Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of ILJIN Diamond Co. Ltd.
